long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Where Is The Turkey with search all in your new tab
What is Where Is The Turkey Extension?
It  is a thrilling and fast-paced card game that puts your observational skills and quick thinking to the ultimate test. The objective of the game is straightforward yet tantalizingly tricky: find the elusive turkey card from a set of four cards.

Installation
1. By clicking on the Add to Chrome button.
2. By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Where Is The Turkey extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ new tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Search results will be provided by Microsoft bing. You may remove or disable this extension anytime.
3. Review our Privacy Policy: https://whereistheturkey.com/privacy-policy.html
4. Review our Terms of Service: https://whereistheturkey.com/terms.html

Features
* Uninstall anytime easily from the new tab.
* Search from your new tab
